itemDescription: British World War II ferry pilot (1917-2018)

wikipedia_page.main: Mary Ellis (née Wilkins; 2 February 1917 – 24 July 2018) was a British ferry pilot, and one of the last surviving British women pilots from the Second World War.

response: *1917 – Mary Ellis, British World War II ferry pilot (d. 2018)
* Mary Ellis, ATA Pilot 1941–1945, later managing director of Sandown Airport. Mary died in July 2018 aged 101
* Mary Ellis, WWII pilot in the United Kingdom
